message: I'm feeling generous, let's start fair. You get 10% and I'll take 90%. Accept and we'll both be happy.
Let's be fair. I'll take 90%, and you can have the remaining 10%. It's your turn to accept or reject.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 10%.  Let's split it 80/20 this time.  It's a fair deal for both of us.

I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm going to need a larger share to make it worthwhile. This time, I'll take 80%, and you can have 20%.  Think about it carefully, this is your last chance to accept before the inflation hits us both.
We're getting closer. Let's split it 70/30 this time.  I'm still feeling the impact of inflation, but I'm willing to go lower to make a deal.
I'm getting closer to accepting a deal. This time I'll take 70%, and you can have 30%. We both need to find common ground. This is getting risky for both of us with each passing round.
